DocAttribute.Name: BasisCurve
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve to be trimmed. For curves with multiple representations any parameter values given as Trim1 or Trim2 refer to the master representation of the BasisCurve only.

DocAttribute.Name: Trim1
DocAttribute.Documentation: The first trimming point which may be specified as a Cartesian point, as a real parameter or both.

DocAttribute.Name: Trim2
DocAttribute.Documentation: The second trimming point which may be specified as a Cartesian point, as a real parameter or both.

DocAttribute.Name: SenseAgreement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Flag to indicate whether the direction of the trimmed curve agrees with or is opposed to the direction of the basis curve.

DocAttribute.Name: MasterRepresentation
DocAttribute.Documentation: Where both parameter and point are present at either end of the curve this indicates the preferred form.

DocWhereRule.Name: Trim1ValuesConsistent
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either a single value is specified for Trim1, or the two trimming values are of different type (point and parameter)

DocWhereRule.Name: Trim2ValuesConsistent
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either a single value is specified for Trim2, or the two trimming values are of different type (point and parameter)

DocWhereRule.Name: NoTrimOfBoundedCurves
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Already bounded curves shall not be trimmed.
